body_html: It seems that the LBFGS test is a bit flaky. I recreated the same thing in Python and am getting some flaky-ness from the Python version as well. Any suggestions on how to make this more deterministic?
body_text: It seems that the LBFGS test is a bit flaky.  I recreated the same thing in Python and am getting some flaky-ness from the Python version as well.  Any suggestions on how to make this more deterministic?
body: It seems that the LBFGS test is a bit flaky.  I recreated the same thing in Python and am getting some flaky-ness from the [Python version](https://gist.github.com/lematt1991/6c74ff9bfd0063cbaa6d94ac4ed0f064) as well.  Any suggestions on how to make this more deterministic?
